newsitem.title: DUBAI: PRESS DIGEST - United Arab Emirates - March 1.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - United Arab Emirates - March 1.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the United Arab Emirates press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- UAE President Sheikh Zaid bin Sultan al-Nahayan sends cable to King Hassan of Morocco.
- British trade mission expected to arrive on Saturday.
- Luxury cruise ship arrives in Dubai.
- Waste reduction drive gets positive response.
- UAE role in combating drugs lauded.
- Gulf Arab envoys ask U.N. Security Council to hold urgent meeting on Israel's settlement drive.
